About Bird Island
hidden widget 336-98048df
About Bird Island
hidden widget 336-d4043f6
Our Airboat route quietly circles Bird Island so guests can view the spectacular Florida wildlife!
Bird Island is within view from the Black Hammock peninsula with coastal birds flying between land masses.
Some of the birds documented here are: White Pelican, Purple Gallinule, Bald Eagle, Limpkin, Great Egret, Snowy Egret, Little Blue Heron, Glossy Ibis, Wood Stork, White Ibis, Cattle Egret, Common Moorhen, American Coot, Boat-tailed Grackle, Black Vulture, Double-crested Cormorant, Anhinga, Black-necked Stilt, Pileated Woodpecker, Green Heron, Black-Bellied Whistling Duck, Wild Turkey …and several other unidentified plovers, hummingbirds, wrens and sparrows.
Bird Island on Lake Jesup
Our facilities rests on the banks of Lake Jesup and is adjacent to the Black Hammock Wilderness area.  Multiple Osprey nests and families are directly on the property. We do not charge an entry fee to visit our site and we offer a FREE live alligator exhibit as well.
We also do not feed, harass or interact with the abundant bird population or wildlife and we are witnessing more and more successful breeding species every year. Wild Boar, White-tailed Deer, Marsh Rabbits and Alligator Gar also inhabit the lake as well and can be seen on occasion.  We embrace the seasonal birds, plant life, amazing cypress trees, thousands of alligators and the general wonder of this ecosystem.
History
On May 22, 1837, Lieutenant Peyton, with a command of twenty men and four Creek Indians, set out from Fort Mellon to explore the little known upper reaches of the St Johns River. They camped that night on what is now aptly known as Bird Island on Lake Jesup. One hundred and sixty four years later to the day, four members of Seminole Audubon Society, accompanied by two biologists from St Johns River Water Management District, surveyed birds on the island, finding an amazing 512 wading birds.

Orlando Airboat Rides – Packages
Orlando Airboat Rides – Packages
Explore Packages
Any ride (except for the 1hr night ride) leaving after 5:00pm will incur a $20 convenience charge per group when available.
**Need to check in by 4:30pm for a 5:00pm departure.
All reservations will depart within 30 minutes of check-in at the gift shop.
INDIVIDUAL PACKAGES
GROUP PACKAGES
FAQS
AIRBOAT RIDES IN ORLANDO - INDIVIDUAL PACKAGES -
PETS NOT PERMITTED
Buy 2 Get 1 Free 30 MINUTE RIDE – Labor Day Special
$35/ $40 (Fri-Sun) +Tax ADULT
$30.00 +Tax CHILD
Buy 2 Get 1 Free 30 Minute Airboat Ride  *Labor Day Special*
Enjoy a 30 minutes tour by Airboat, taking you around Lake Jesup and The Historic Bird Island. You will have a chance to see alligators and wild bird species native to the area.
Come out and help us find the Gator’s nest as Mating season has just ended. Right now is the perfect season to meet with our alligator friends on Lake Jesup. With about 13 thousand gators lastly registered at this location, you can expect to meet a LOT of them ! Morning lovers, they will come out mostly in the morning as the temperatures are still cool and will go for a bath later in the day.
Time to take some fresh air at the Black Hammock!
Seating capacity will be limited.
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
Book Now

$30.00 +Tax CHILD

Enjoy a 30 minutes tour by Airboat, taking you around Lake Jesup and The Historic Bird Island. You will have a chance to see alligators and wild bird species native to the area.

$30 +Tax ADULT
$28 +Tax CHILD
*Summer Special Price*
For a limited time only, Florida residents with a valid ID will enjoy discounted pricing on our 30 minutes airboat ride around Lake Jesup and Bird Island when they purchase tickets online!
Book now to reserve your seats!
Seating capacity will be limited.
*Online reservation required.
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
Book Now
Small Private Charter Special
$320 +Tax ADULT
30 Minute Private Ride around Lake Jesup and Bird Island. Airboat and Captain reserved for your group only!
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
On this personalized VIP tour for  a maximum of 6 people, visitors will have the opportunity to witness first-hand our unique Florida ecosystem and the solitary beauty of tropical hardwood hammocks, cypress domes, plants, and wildlife in their natural habitats.
Take a ride through our wonderful Lake Jesup on a private boat for your group! Our Master Airboat Captain will amaze you with knowledge of the lake, animals, and history. Then check out the Lazy Gator Bar on the lake for spectacular views.
Price is $300.00 plus tax for up to 6 people.
11:30AM Departure- 30 Minute Private tour
All reservations will depart within 30 minutes of check-in at the gift shop.
Book Now
1 HOUR RIDE
$60 +Tax ADULT
$45 +Tax CHILD

Enjoy a 1 hour tour by Airboat, taking you around Lake Jesup and The Historic Bird Island. You will have a chance to see alligators and wild bird species native to the area.
Come out and help us find the Gator’s nest as Mating season has just ended. Right now is the perfect season to meet with our alligator friends on Lake Jesup. With about 10 thousand gators lastly registered at this location, you can expect to meet a LOT of them ! Time to take some fresh air at the Black Hammock !
Departures every day !
Seating capacity will be limited.
Minimum of 6 people. 24 Hour Advanced Reservation Required.
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
Book Now

$60 +Tax ADULT
$55 +Tax CHILD
24 hour advance reservation required.
30 Minute Sunset tour for a minimum of 6 guests
Ride at night! Zoom around Lake Jesup and Historic Bird Island after sunset on a tour where you will have the chance to see alligators and 20+ species of wild birds.
Seating capacity will be limited.
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
Book Now
1 HOUR NIGHT RIDE
$84.00 +Tax ADULT
$74.00 +Tax CHILD
Take a tour of Lake Jesup at night. Our captains are US Coast Guard certified and trained to take you on the best tour you’ve ever had, riding at night! Use spotlights to search for wildlife around the shores of the lake. Zoom around Bird Island before returning to the Marina. See what Lake Jesup holds at night, this thrilling tour awaits
Minimum of 12 paying customers.
Please check in 30 minutes prior to your ride with the Gift Shop.
Book Now
VIP ECO-TOUR *24 HOUR ADVANCED RESERVATION REQUIRED*
$55 +Tax ADULT
30 Minute Private Ride around Lake Jesup and Bird Island. Airboat and Captain reserved for your group only!
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
On this personalized VIP tour for  a minimum of 6 people and a maximum of 17 maximum, visitors will have the opportunity to witness first-hand our unique Florida ecosystem and the solitary beauty of tropical hardwood hammocks, cypress domes, plants, and wildlife in their natural habitats.
Price is $55.00 per person plus tax.
Please call ahead for parties with more than 6 guests and additional times.
All reservations will depart within 30 minutes of check-in at the gift shop.

Perfect for family get-togethers, corporate events, team building and more. When you book for a group tour of 12 or more people, you save!  More more details, availability, and  for larger groups, please call 407-365-1244.
Please check in at the gift shop 30 minutes before your reservation.
Book Now
FAQS
What time should I arrive?
Please arrive at least 15 to 30 minutes before your scheduled departure time and check in at the Gift Shop.
Are reservations required?
No reservations required for our 30 minute airboat rides from 9:15 am – 5:00 pm daily. After 5:00 pm there is a charge of $20 per party when available.
Are there age requirements?
There are no age/height requirements for our airboat rides. Children under 2 years of age may sit in your lap or ride beside you. Children under 6 years of age are required to wear a life vest and ear protection which we provide for you. Children under 6 are also required to wear eye protection (such as sunglasses, which can be purchased in the gift shop or brought from home). We also highly recommend eye protection for adults.
What is the best time to ride?
The alligators and wildlife are more active in the morning and evening hours during the summer months and mid-afternoon in the winter months.
What is the appropriate attire?
Summer / Fall:
Dress light, wear sunblock, sunglasses and bring comfortable shoes.
Winter / Spring:
Wear layered clothing to ensure comfort.
Am I guaranteed to see gators?
Our Captains are experienced in and will do their best to seek out the locations in which alligators frequent. Lake Jesup is the most alligator populated lake in Florida. Each tour is unique and quite unpredictable. During the warmer months, the morning rides are better and during the colder months, the warmer hours are best for airboat tours.
What kind of equipment do you use?
Life vest and ear protection are provided to all of our passengers. Children under six years of age are required to wear life vests and ear protection we provide, and eye protection, such as sunglasses (can be purchased in the gift shop). Eye protection is also highly recommended for adults. Eye protection can be brought from home (glasses, sunglasses, goggles, etc) or purchased in our gift shop.
Are pets allowed on the boat?
Unfortunately,  we are not able to accommodate your pet on the airboat tours or near the waters. For your safety, the safety of your pet, and the safety of others we do not allow pets down the peninsula or on our airboat tours. Service animals are permitted but we do advise against it, again, for safety.

Upcoming Events
1st Annual Fun Day – Supporting All Veterans
The Bunker Riders Club invites you:
Donate to Ride Event from Audio Excellence Oviedo to The Black Hammock Restaurant.
Unite for a shared cause!
Join us for Action Packed Activities and Giveaways — all for a powerful cause! We’re riding for our heroes — the brave men and women who’ve served our country. Help us give back by teaming up and riding to support our Veterans — Join with us at our Fun Day Event this August. Every dollar makes a difference. Every rider counts. It’s a salute. All proceeds go directly to Supporting Local Veterans through The Bunker Riders Club.
We should have 200 motorcycles to support veterans!
Location:
Audio Excellence / The Black Hammock & Lazy Gator
Date:
23rd, August 2025
Time:
AE Event Time: 08:00, Ride Out: 10:00-12:00, Lazy Gator Bar: 13:00-18:00
Address:
385 W Mitchell Hammock Rd, Oviedo, FL 32765
Phone:
407-977-8730

About the Owner
Joel Martin was born in Paris, France. His family moved to Africa when he was young, and there he grew up surrounded by the magnificent wildlife. He spent a lot of his youth out in the jungles hunting snakes, alligators and other creatures. His survival skills were honed by his many African and Malgache friends.
He returned to France to do his tour of duty. He chose to be in the Navy which had their base at Toulon, in the beautiful south of France. After his tour of duty was over, he settled in Corsica, where he opened a restaurant and nightclub. He also had a small ranch where he could ride his horses.
After 12 years spent in Corsica, he decided to open a franchise of mini supermarkets in several ski resorts in the French Alps.
The lure of the French Riviera drew Joel and family. There he went to open a real estate company. But all plans changed in 1995, when he won a green card and was allowed to emigrate to America. Without hesitation, he packed up the family and moved to the States. Joel chose Florida as he enjoys the heat and humidity, so reminiscent of his youth.
His choice of lifestyle led him to the Oviedo area where he could live in the country and keep his horse. On a morning walk one day he discovered that not 5 minutes away is the Black Hammock Restaurant, on lovely Lake Jesup, with it’s mangroves and alligators. Now he knows he is in paradise! He is at home just as he was in Africa.
Joel obtained his American Citizenship, fully living out his AMERICAN DREAM!
To further improve Black Hammock Adventures’ air boat business Joel obtained his Master Airboat License. He, as well as all of Black Hammock’s airboat pilots, have their Master Airboat Captain License.
